segments.text: What's the bonus like at your company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's OK , I suppose . We get about the equivalent of six months ' salary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Six months ' salary ? Are you serious ? That's incredible !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe . But you'd be amazed at how little's left after the credit companies have deducted their share from my account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , I know what that's like . I bought a BMW on my Visa card . Now the payments really hurt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you're lucky that you're still able to make your payments . I missed a credit payment last month . Now my bank account's overdrawn , and the company is threatening to take back my purchases .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Health Monitor ? I read an article about that racket.They ' re overpriced to begin with ! Listen , if I were you , I'd let them take back their monitor and spend my money on something more practical .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's something else ! Maybe I'll return it to them .
segments.speaker: S2
